I is for Immovable

Immovable objects create the boundaries of the game

Take a look at the sprites in the game. The center sprite is set to immovable. When other sprites collide with the center sprite, they will bounce off.

References

This lesson references the following other lessons:

  • B is for Bounce
  • C is for Collision
  • S is for Sprite
